detectCmp.exists: body > div:not([id]) > div#cookies-wrapper > div:nth-child(2)#ot-cookie-banner > div:nth-child(2):not([id]) > div:not([id]) > span:nth-child(1)#cookies-dismiss

optOut.waitForThenClick: body > div:not([id]) > div#cookies-wrapper > div:nth-child(2)#ot-cookie-banner > div:nth-child(2):not([id]) > div:not([id]) > span:nth-child(1)#cookies-dismiss

test.waitForVisible: body > div:not([id]) > div#cookies-wrapper > div:nth-child(2)#ot-cookie-banner > div:nth-child(2):not([id]) > div:not([id]) > span:nth-child(1)#cookies-dismiss
